meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>news report</kanji> that covers things <kanji>beforehand</kanji> (before they happen) is a <vocabulary>forecast</vocabulary>. For example, a weather forecast is a 天気予報.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
